name: Youtubers Life: Fashion
summary: Youtubers Life is the best selling life simulation/tycoon videogame on iOS. Become the world’s greatest content creator in history by editing videos, expanding the number of fans and turning yourself into a wealthy fellow. With the new Fashion Channel, you can now engage with your audience in fun, new ways. Experience how cool it is to become a top model, taylor every aspect of your personal life or design your own clothes. How long will it take you to be featured on the cover of the most important fashion magazines?
